sentences.sContent: their ongoing search for a new director
sentences.sCn: 他们仍在寻找一个新主任

sentences.sContent: ...but will also be in the ability to run real time data analytics to extract actionable and ongoing knowledge...
...which are ongoing projects that look at trends or customer satisfaction over a long period of time...
...The dry statistics ought to inform the ongoing deficit debate...
...has ongoing conversations with her friends about how the Obama presidency has changed their daily lives and hopes to put some of those ideas...

synos.tran: 不间断的，进行的；前进的

remMethod.val: on(进行地) + going → 进行中的 → 持续的
